home.name: Panachon Kumnuengpanadon

about.title: About Me
about.description: Hello, my name is Panachon Kumnuengpanadon. I am a student at Chiang Mai Technical College, majoring in Software Development. I am interested in web application development, particularly using the Next.js and Angular frameworks. I have been working as an outsource for SoftInter for one year, where I primarily work on developing web applications with Next.js due to its flexible structure and ability to facilitate rapid development.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description-lantong: Lan Thong Chiang Mai Limited Partnership operates an online sidecar (motorcycle attachment) sales website. It also features a backend management system and a customer shop review system.
projects.description-ai-resume: AI Resume, using user data to create a resume suitable for the desired job position.
projects.description-weather-station: Weather checking website for Chiang Mai Technical College using the Meteorological Department's dataset and a Random Forest Model to predict tomorrow's weather conditions.
projects.description-e-commerce: E-commerce website developed using Next.js It includes a backend management system and a shopping cart system.
projects.description-weather-hub: Weather Hub is a web application that provides real-time weather updates and forecasts for various locations using data from reliable Open-Meteo.
